ygData.subject: Re: Fanged Skull Stiletto
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, the other thing I found interesting about this is that it is not lore, and also not no-drop.  Which implies 1) dual wielding them.  And 2) you dont have
ygData.messageBody:
Well, the other thing I found interesting about this is that it is not lore, and also not no-drop. Which
implies 1) dual wielding them. And 2) you dont' have to go there personally to get one. Of course, with
a weight of 5.0, dual weilding them will chew stamina pretty quick. No big deal though. Yay Verant for
re-intruducing this item!

Laluni Songhammer of E'Ci
